text: Thomas Frederik Smith (born 21 May 1996) is an English cricketer who played for Glamorgan. Primarily a right-handed batsman, he also bowls right-arm off break. He made his Twenty20 debut for the Marylebone Cricket Club in the 2018 MCC Tri-Nation Series against Nepal on 29 July 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Bristol Category:Glamorgan cricketers Category:Marylebone Cricket Club cricketers Category:Dorset cricketers Category:Wales Minor Counties cricketers
title: Tom Smith (cricketer, born 1996)
